title: period referred to in Articles 2 and 3 of the following Order was the leader of a
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers (Leader,
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers (Leader, 
Minister for the Environment, Climate and Communications and Minister for 
Transport) (No. 2) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (leader minister environment climate communication minister transport) (no 2) order 2024

title: period referred to in Articles 2 and 3 of the following Order was the leader of a
heading: 2. Each person mentioned in the Schedule, particulars of each of whose
text_raw:
2. Each person mentioned in the Schedule, particulars of each of whose 
address were deposited at the offices of the Department of the Taoiseach, is 
appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Minister of the Government who is the 
leader of a political party registered in the Register of Political Parties and 
Minister for the Environment, Climate and Communications for the period from 
9 April 2024 to 7 July 2024.
text_norm: 2 person mentioned schedule particular whose address deposited office department taoiseach appointed special adviser minister government leader political party registered register political party minister environment climate communication period 9 april 2024 7 july 2024

title: period referred to in Articles 2 and 3 of the following Order was the leader of a
heading: 3. Each person mentioned in the Schedule, particulars of each of whose
text_raw:
3. Each person mentioned in the Schedule, particulars of each of whose 
address were deposited at the offices of the Department of the Taoiseach is 
appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Minister of the Government who is the 
leader of a political party registered in the Register of Political Parties and 
Minister for Transport for the period from 9 April 2024 to 7 July 2024. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 4th October, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [505] 3
